short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Google Chrome extension to submit UMB.FYI tips

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension providers a quick and easy way for Umbraco developers/users to submit interesting links for consideration in the next UMB.FYI newsletter.

If you are reading a great article, or watching a super interesting video, just click the extension icon, and submit the link as a tip, optionally providing a message on why you think it's of interest.

With your help we can be sure to capture every umbmazing article out there.
